reviewtext: We'd had a sensor fail on an existing light and I ordered this to replace it.  The older unit was from a different manufacturer, but looked identical and carried the same model number.  Installation was straightforward--I simply removed the existing wire nuts, removed the old unit from the light housing, and reversed the process to install the new one.  It works dependably, as advertised.This was a much cheaper option than buying a new motion flood light fixture.
summary: Excellent replacement sensor for outdoor motion flood light
